job_description: Collaborate with frontend developers to integrate backend services seamlessly.
Experience in building backend systems from scratch to completion.
Looking for a backend engineer who’s comfortable with the Python and Node.js/Deno software ecosystems to design, implement, and orchestrate backend…
Experience with frontend and backend manual testing.
Manualtestingandsprintactivities ○ Review Product Requirements Documents (PRDs), Epics, and User Stories.
It's also the easiest way for any company to leverage the data they already have to solve their hardest business problems.
Manage the performance, scalability, and cost of our backend.
Keep our production and staging environments running smoothly.
Collaborate with UI/UX teams to integrate a user-friendly interface with robust backend services.
2.5 to 5 years of hands-on experience in Freeswitch.
Diligently handle new feature development, conducting impact analysis, coordinating with Product Manager for the development of the new features.
2-6 years of experience in backend development.
Part of the core team and responsible for end to end development.
Design robust APIs to support any clients.
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, or a related field with a minimum of 6-8 years of experience in backend development and integrations.
Facilitate collaboration between engineers, product owners, and other stakeholders.
On the backend, we’re looking for experience with PHP/Node.js/Python.
